text:
T-REX Group | Full-Stack dev, QA, Product Owner | Tel Aviv, Israel | Onsite http://www.trexgroup.com/

We are a Fintech startup focused on the renewable energy finance market, with some of the largest financial institutions in the U.S. using our risk analytics platform.

We are expanding our development team in Tel-Aviv as our platform is getting traction and post our recent Series B funding.

Our stack is Python / Django / BackboneJS / SaaS / PostgreSql / AWS and we have some great challenges ahead of us as we begin integrating large datasets from our customers.

Our open positions:
